alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 19 at 2:45AM PST until November 19 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 10 inches up to 8000 feet. 12 to 18 inches expected above 8000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow will fall early Sunday morning with diminishing snow intensity during the day on Sunday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
